tool_description: A nice REST API to get delicious recipes from some websites and blogs.
name: The Recipes
title: The Recipes

api_list.name: Search by website or blog
api_list.description:
this endpoint returns a list of recipes of a specific website or blog from the following :

```
[
	 "allrecipes",
     "delish",
     "tastyusa",
     "tastychina",
     "tastyitaly",
     "tastyjapan",
     "tastymexico",
     ];
```
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-recipes.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/allrecipes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-recipes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-recipes.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-recipes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get recipes
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of all food recipes.
